alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Graves; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Massac, northeastern Carlisle, southeastern Ballard, McCracken and northwestern Graves Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lovelaceville, or 7 miles southwest of Lone Oak, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Paducah and Barkley Regional Airport around 410 PM CDT. Lone Oak and West Paducah around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Metropolis and Brookport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 10. Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 33 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
